name: Swadeshi Mario
description:
Let's rewind a bit , say 3 decades ?

Welcome to the world of retro !

This game will remind you of everyhing that our 'ancestors' used to play for, back in the day ....

I am offering you a chance to be teleoported into the eighties  ,,,, 

This game has multiple levels of challenging fun: 

All you need is a keyboard and mouse !

Are YOU READY Player One!
